# 生物信息学培训教材（北京华大基因研究中心）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shengwu-xinxixue-peixunjiaocai-beijing-huadajiyin-yanjiu-zhongxin
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shengwu-xinxixue-peixunjiaocai-beijing-huadajiyin-yanjiu-zhongxin
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shengwu-xinxixue-peixunjiaocai-beijing-huadajiyin-yanjiu-zhongxin
shengwu-xinxixue-peixunjiaocai-beijing-huadajiyin-yanjiu-zhongxin <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shengwu-xinxixue-peixunjiaocai-beijing-huadajiyin-yanjiu-zhongxin
shengwu-xinxixue-peixunjiaocai-beijing-huadajiyin-yanjiu-zhongxin <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
